blockers.description: Sample size N=24 too small; Wilson CI spans 36.7pp. Evidence: data/benchmark_manifest.json.
Error concentration on label A (7/14 errors = 50%). Evidence: experiments/09_ablation_study/results_post_patch_n24_offline_2026-02-09.json.
Symbolic verifier inactive (clingo not installed). Evidence: docs/failure_registry.md.

votes.rationale: Dependencies broken (clingo missing), router unfixed. Must run B1 comparator first.
Baseline b1_direct_prompting.py exists. Approve conditional on B1 >= 35% accuracy.
Dual-track de-risks by exploring alternatives in parallel. Recommended fallback if voting ties.
Fix infra parallel rather than freeze all tuning. Hybrid approach preferred.

notes: NORMALIZATION NOTE: Original ballot had 'hold'→'abstain' (P1, P4), 'agent_id'→'agent', 'proposals'→'votes' (object→array). Original had 3 top risks as blockers — restored from 1 to 3. Kill shot: Complex architecture provides no added value over simple baseline due to (1) router fails on A-priority cases, (2) symbolic verifier inactive, (3) N=24 too small to prove superiority. Counter-plan: Run B1 on N=24, if B1 >= B0, pivot to P2 with rule post-filter.
